reviewText: Grab a friend ASAP and go play this crazy space brawler! It's a perfect game for those cozy saturday evenings with pizza and local multiplayer games. Insanely polished and highly recommended for everyone who's into fun. <3

reviewText: If space shooters are your thing and you're looking for some fun time with your buddies, then ORBIT will certainly gravitate towards you! ;) Just be sure you have some spare controllers lying around, local only!
voteText: 6 of 7 people (86%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: ORBIT (by 4bit - see what they did there?) is a fantastic game to play with up to 3 friends. Highly polished mechanics, great visuals and an amazing soundtrack make it a wonderful party game.\n\nOrbit is original, fun, and extremely well made. I cannot recommend this game enough!

reviewText:
Wow, just wow!

We have been playing for a couple of hours now, and could not have been more happy! :D
Just loving the arcade graphics and the intense music. Feels really polished!

Get some friends together and try it, cause this is game is a total must have"!
Absolutely recommended for parties or gatherings! :)"

reviewText:
First of all, this game is beautiful.

The UI, menus and everything has a very good feel to it. Aesthetically pleasing.

The gameplay is fun and addictive. An awesome way for friends to have fun and blast each other! :)

Lack of the ability to play alone is kind of a downside.

doesnt work with any of my controlers.  both USB.
i configured both of them in big picture and had an xbox controller app to emulate. still nothin.
game might be ok but i cant use it. why isnt USB a standard controller type?

So i wasnt able to play at all. I looked for some help on this but i have seen nothing online about it. there is very little info about this game. normally ill spend a hell of a lot of time getting a game to work but here... i just want to play something fun to play with my kids on local. this isnt it for me.

So with the above in mind i rate this not recommened.
